org.qcri.rheem.jdbc.platform

Class JdbcPlatformTemplate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qcri.rheem.core.platform.Platform
      • org.qcri.rheem.jdbc.platform.JdbcPlatformTemplate
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PostgresPlatform, Sqlite3Platform

    public abstract class JdbcPlatformTemplate
extends Platform
    Platform implementation for a JDBC-accessible database.
